name: Candid-Web-Hosting
overview:
About Candid Web Hosting

Absolute reliability of the servers and the service. Welcome to Candid

In just a few years Candid has grown from few customers to having over 2,000 customers. We began working from a small office in basement and have grown and expanded to two offices in India. We have grown from one server to 15 servers. Our staff has grown from the original two founders to 68 employees with office in New Delhi.

We understand hosting to be a service just like any other. It is the assurance we make to keep your web sites and mails up and running without interruption.

Hosting is just like any other service. We are dedicated to what we do. We are good at it too. We never hide behind technical jargons, never have to. Never display messages or leave you to automated answers when you would rather have a human voice explain it to you.
